name: Marigolds(WIP)
description:
Installation Instructions
Unzip and use .exe to launch short experience.

Controls

  • Use Mouse up and down to move into the hospital and into the room
  • Drag mouse left and right (not yet working for mobile)
  • Click on hotspots to interact
  • Select Textboxes to type

Marigolds

I lost family during Covid in early 2021. I wanted to make this game to give myself a chance to speak to them, something I didn't get to do before they passed. This is an experiement, I hope to continue the project in the future.
